references.paper_title: Cogvideox: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: It is the base model for the authors' method for looped video generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: It outlines the basic model that current large text-to-video models are based on.
It represents the fundamental background in which text to video generation happens.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: It is cited as the model that realizes better visual and temporal qualities.
It outlines the diffusion model architecture utilized by the authors.
